contest-event.event-date:
May 16, 1925 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
Der Wildschütz [arr. Godfrey Jr.]
Victoria Park, Holmfirth March ("British Legion"): 1. Meltham, 2. Hinchliffe. Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £9, 4th £6, 5th £3. 11 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 9:13 p.m. Nov. 5, 2018, 9:50 a.m.
1 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe
2 Hepworth Band Walter Nuttall
3 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Halliwell
4 Oldham Rifles Band Charles Anderson
5 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Joseph Crawford Dyson
